steth-spophia 160366366898 "2017-05-06 12:01:24 GMT" https://steth-spophia.tumblr.com/post/160366366898/read-and-reblog "judgement-booty: taz fandom
column2: we really need to talk about this. or rather
column3: i‚Äôm going to talk and you need to listen
column4: because this is in fact a serious issue that is negatively effecting gay people in fandom spaces
column5: and i want to do something about it
column6: but so far i have been met with mostly negative backlash and harassment
column7: and it‚Äôs taking a big toll on my mental health. so please
column8: listen to what i have to say
column9: and use it to take your actions into consideration.taako is the only confirmed gay boy in the series. he is feminine and likes to wear skirts. it should be obvious even from this information that shipping him with dozens of boys carries bad implications involving stereotypes about gay boys
column10: along with a considerable amount of the shipping content involving him cheating on
column13: it exists. in large multitude.)even if you ship him in a healthy relationship with another boy
column14: you are still derailing our preexisting canon representation - you are proving that you do not view taako‚Äôs canonical relationship with kravitz as a relationship
column15: but as a ship. something interpretational. something¬†‚Äòoptional‚Äô that you can choose to support based on whether you¬†‚Äòlike‚Äô it or not. we are more than that. our representation is worth more than that.shipping was literally invented to fetishize gay men - it started with star trek
column16: when non-gay men would create zines featuring porn of the actors who played the characters. shipping has always been something hypothetical
column17: something ‚Äòfun‚Äô for non-gay men to partake in. we do not exist to be your fun
column19: your entertainment.¬†not only is this hurting gay men
column20: but the oversaturation of fetishistic m/m content is overpowering the w/w content in the fandom
column21: and giving less space for lesbians to express and enjoy their representation in the show.¬†you are putting your fun above our lives
column22: our safety and our happiness. shipping has been viewed as harmless fun for decades now
column23: and even if my viewpoint is a new one that you will view as¬†‚Äòirrational‚Äô
column24: it is still an important one
column25: and i want to make a change in fandoms for the better. i am not just inventing problems where there are none. this is important to me
column26: and to others. so remember this: when shipping exists to increase gay representation
column27: it is good and should be supported. but if you‚Äôre shipping just to have fun with gay men? you need to reconsider how important your ‚Äòfun‚Äô really is." False text

steth-spophia 160170695498 "2017-04-30 23:58:03 GMT" https://steth-spophia.tumblr.com/post/160170695498/depression-tips "rage-quitter: shower. not a bath
column2: a shower. use water as hot or cold as u like. u dont even need to wash. just get in under the water and let it run over you for a while. sit on the floor if you gotta. moisturize everything. use whatever lotion u like. unscented? dollar store lotion? fancy ass 48 hour lotion that makes u smell like a field of wildflowers? use whatever you want
column3: and use it all over.¬† put on clean
column4: comfortable clothes.¬† put on ur favorite underwear. cute black lacy panties? those ridiculous boxers u bought last christmas with candy cane hearts on the butt? put em on. drink cold water. use ice. if u want
column5: add some mint or lemon for an extra boost. clean something. doesn‚Äôt have to be anything big. organize one drawer of ur desk. wash five dirty dishes. do a load of laundry. scrub the bathroom sink.¬† blast music. listen to something upbeat and dancey and loud
column6: something that‚Äôs got lots of energy. sing to it
column8: even if you suck at both. make food. don‚Äôt just grab a granola bar to munch. take the time and make food. even if it‚Äôs ramen. add something special to it
column9: like a hard boiled egg or some veggies. prepare food
column11: and you‚Äôll feel like you accomplished something.¬† make something. write a short story or a poem
column17: anything artistic. even if you don‚Äôt think you‚Äôre good at it. go outside. take a walk. sit in the grass. look at the clouds. smell flowers. put your hands in the dirt and feel the soil against your skin. call someone. call a loved one
column20: call a chat service if you have no one else to call. talk to a stranger on the street. have a conversation and listen to someone‚Äôs voice. if you can‚Äôt
column22: just have some social interaction with another person. even if you don‚Äôt say much
column23: listen to them. cuddle your pets if you have them/can cuddle them. take pictures of them. talk to them. tell them how u feel
column25: a new game coming out. " False text
